Test Name: MAYOCOMPLETE Chronic Lymphoid Neoplasms, Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS)
Purpose: To detect and characterize genetic variants associated with chronic lymphoid neoplasms using next-generation sequencing for accurate diagnosis and management.
Container: Not specified in SOP (standard blood or bone marrow collection tube)
Equipment: NGS sequencing instrument (e.g., Illumina MiSeq/NextSeq), DNA extraction kits, library preparation kits, thermal cycler, Qubit fluorometer, Bioanalyzer/TapeStation, magnetic stand, multichannel pipette
